cinimaticCaption.caption: FORGE: Hey, how 'bout one for the scrapbook, Professor?
ANDERS: If you don't mind, Sergeant, I'm trying to document
this area for study.
ARBITER: You will come with me.
FORGE: Why don't we put the lady down and talk about this
man to freak.
ARBITER: As you wish.
ANDERS: Stop!
FORGE: Anders, get out of here!
ANDERS: I'll come quietly if you let him live.
SPARTAN: Sir?
FORGE: I'm okay. Spirit of Fire, this is Forge. I lost Anders.
CUTTER: What happened?
FORGE: Some massive Elite came out of nowhere!
SERINA: Captain. I'm tracking her transponder.
It's heading away from the planet.
CUTTER: Damn it! Sergeant, get up here on the double.
FORGE: Already en route, sir.
FORGE: We're all accounted for; why haven't we left yet?
CUTTER: Why aren't you in the med-bay, Sergeant?
SERINA: The professor's signal has gone to lightspeed, headed for the border.
SPARTAN: That puts it outside weapon range.
FORGE: What? We have to go after her!
SERINA: Sir, I can only track that transponder a few more seconds.
FORGE: Captain -
SPARTAN: Sir, Anders represents a significant security breach.
CUTTER: Serina, get us underway immediately. Follow that signal.
SERINA: Aye aye, sir.
So...we left a note saying we're leaving, right?
UNKNOWN LOCATION FEBRUARY 23RD 2531
CUTTER: Where the hell are we, Serina?
SERINA: We're in orbit around a planet in the middle of...
Actually, I'm still working on that, sir.
CUTTER: Anders?
SERINA: The Covenant vessel we pursued appears to have taken cover
on the planet's surface. I have rough coordinates.
CUTTER: Any sign of other Covenant activity?
SERINA: Not that I can detect, although this world is
giving off some pretty crazy readings.
CUTTER: Get Forge down there.
SERINA: I believe he is already aboard a Pelican, awaiting your word.
